#summary A list of Ether Painter Implementations

= Ether Painter Implemenations =

Ether painter classes provided by default: 
 # [Timeline_GregorianEtherPainterClass Timeline.GregorianEtherPainter]
 # [Timeline_HotZoneGregorianEtherPainterClass Timeline.HotZoneGregorianEtherPainter]. 

They all expose the [Timeline_EtherPainterClass ether painter interface], but they differ in their initialization parameters.

There is also an undocumented [Timeline_JapaneseEraEtherPainterClass Timeline.JapaneseEraEtherPainter].
